Description: Auction title: ESP LTD EC-1000 35th Anniversary Eclipse Model Guitar Auction description: This is a used electric guitar that shows light wear and tear, and is in overall very good condition. Light wear means that a casual inspection will show some signs of wear and tear, but the instrument is free of any sort of damage which includes deep scratches, nicks, chips or gouges. This guitar is made in Korea, and is equipped with the original pickups. This auction includes the guitar and a hard case. All pictures are of the actual item you are bidding on. This item will be shipped via FedEx due to the oversized nature of guitar boxes. This item will be shipped with signature confirmation and insurance, which is reflected in the handling fee. By bidding on this item, you agree to pay shipping charges. NO RESERVE!! Visit our store: http://stores.ebay.com/ohiogoldpawn CUSTOMER SERVICE We strive for happy customers, please ask any questions you may have before placing a bid in AUCTION or completing a BUY IT NOW purchase. We strive for a perfect 5 Stars in our Detailed Sellers Ratings! If you feel you did not receive 5 star service, please contact us so we can resolve any issues. If you are a new buyer with a feedback score of 5 or lower, please contact us when making a bid. We will be happy to work with you and help you get your buyer history established! PAYMENT POLICY PayPal is our preferred payment method. We are happy to offer in-store pick-up for any item. For items picked up in store, you can pay with paypal, or cash/card on pick-up. We are required to charge Ohio sales tax of 6.5% on items picked up in store. UNPAID ITEM POLICY Items that are not paid for within 3 days of the auction closing will have an unpaid item case opened. We do not cancel transactions once an auction has closed except in unusual circumstances. RETURN POLICY All items are sold as-is, and we do not offer returns. SHIPPING METHODS We ship via USPS Parcel Post or Priority Mail flat rate boxes when applicable. SHIPPING POLICY Our goal is to ship within 48 hours upon receipt of payment for an item, however most items are shipped either same day or next day. We ship only to the valid address on file with eBay/PayPal. In accordance with eBay policy, we cannot ship to an alternate address, nor can the address be changed once payment has been received.
Title: ESP LTD EC-1000 35th Anniversary Eclipse Model Guitar
